title: Boosted Account in my Ranked games, what do I do?
body: Had a Jinx in a ranked match earlier and checked him out after losing badly. But the Jinx said she was getting boosted and gave us a link incase any of us wanted to be boosted. The person was 346 wins, and 1 lost. And last season was low silver and is now on a non-stop winning streak. So myy question is do I need to tell Riot and is this legal in game? Or do I have to deal with more boosted people in my promots?
